nodes.text: The Grammus sisters were twin sisters. They were known as a fabulous pair of performance artists in the Canto Bight casino, but were most famous for being the only known source of a legendary vintage of wine. They were patrons from Derla Pidys. Rhomby and Parallela both had a memorable appearance and odd mannerisms. The sisters declared themselves to be from another dimension, and sometimes spoke in a seemingly unknown language.
